section.title: Overview
section.para: The module exports a RPC command to execute MI commands.
The other way around not implemented (MI command to execute RPC) -- to be investigated if worth the effort.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
No dependencies on other &kamailio; modules.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
None.

Depending on the version (e.g. mi, mi_dg) it formats the output in a similar way to the corresponding kamailio mi module:
mi - uses a special, "pretty" format which generates nicer (more readable) output when used with sercmd.
mi_dg - uses an output format similar to the kamailio mi_datagram module.
mi_fifo - uses an output format similar to the kamailio mi_fifo module.
mi_xmlrpc - uses an output format similar to the kamailio mi_xmlrpc module.
section.programlisting: sercmd> mi uptime Now:: Thu Sep 24 18:17:15 2009 Up since:: Thu Sep 24 17:35:45 2009 Up time:: 2490 [sec]
